title: Part (c)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
Student response does not accurately include the following criteria.

Correct answers:

Net torque is not changing.

Angular momentum is increasing.

Note: A correct answer must be selected in order to earn each respective point.

Student response accurately includes one of the following criteria.

Correct answers:

Net torque is not changing.

Angular momentum is increasing.

Note: A correct answer must be selected in order to earn each respective point.

Student response accurately includes both of the following criteria.

Correct answers:

Net torque is not changing.

Angular momentum is increasing.

Note: A correct answer must be selected in order to earn each respective point.

title: Part (d)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Correct answers:

Net torque is decreasing.

Rotational kinetic energy is increasing.

Note: A correct answer must be selected in order to earn each respective point.

1 point is earned for correct reasoning that the net torque is decreasing.

Example Response:

The force providing the net torque is moving closer to the pulley’s axis of rotation.

1 point is earned for correct reasoning that the rotational kinetic energy is increasing.

Example Response:

The net torque exerted on the pulley is in the same direction that the pulley is rotating.

The pulley’s angular speed is increasing.
